WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has reached the 90 day marker without responses.If this is still an issue please resubmit with the Character file in question and related Version where the issue is still present.
WorkItem.Description: I just downloaded the source and compiled. When I run the optimizer, it suggests for my feral druid that I use the Elixir of Demon Slaying (i.e. doesn't catch that this is only for demons).

Comments.Message: Same thing happens to me, guess that +265 ap is too hard to resist or perhaps there are demons in The Lich King's closet along with those skeletons. Seriously, this is no BIG deal . . . We all know that Elixir of Endless Rage is the choice for cats, but it's a tiny pita to change it everytime you optimize in order to get correct stats.
Just dawned upon me . . . Is Elixir of Endless Rage the correct elixir? or should we be using ArP elixirs?
Well, there's a valid question. Endless Rage or would a set of guardian/battle do better? With Demonslaying not modeled right, we can't tell.
